title: Chapter 1198 - Surrounded
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1198 - Surrounded

Heaven and earth shook.

Countless ancient corpses broke free of the earth, their ranks stretching as far as the eye could see.

Vicious, baleful energy gathered around their bodies, like billowing smoke enveloping the dome of heaven. The sight stirred the soul.

Most of the corpses were at the Imperial level, but no small number had once been World King experts.

It was as if an army of the dead had mobilized, their ranks blanketing the entire area as if to sweep across the world.

“Don’t tell me this place is an ancient battlefield?” Su Yi couldn’t help but be stunned. The corpses truly seemed endless.

“No, if this were an ancient battlefield, the corpses wouldn’t have remained here all this time. Perhaps these corpses belong to the experts who perished beneath that mysterious catastrophe…”

But before Su Yi could give the matter any further thought, heaven and earth shook, and a murderous chorus of voices rang out.

“Kill!”

“Kill!”

“Kill!”

The boundless army of ancient corpses swept across the ground, charging at Su Yi from all sides. The sight was enough to make even World Kings give in to despair!

“If I get trapped here, I’m afraid I’ll die of exhaustion.” Su Yi dared not hesitate....
